name: valid_trip_for_sensor
description: Valid request for an ongoing trip for given sensor and name

name: valid_without_name_filter
description: No name filter, expect trips for the sensor if any exist

name: missing_authorization
description: No Authorization header, should be unauthorized

name: invalid_sensor_id
description: Unknown sensorId should return 4xx or 200 with empty data

name: mismatched_trip_name
description: Trip name does not match any ongoing trip for the given sensor

name: empty_name_param
description: Empty 'name' query param, backend may treat it as invalid

name: missing_name_param
description: No 'name' query param sent at all

name: invalid_name_type
description: Name param has wrong type (number instead of string)

name: sensor_id_lowercase
description: Check if sensorId is case-sensitive or not

name: expect_non_empty_history_and_logs
description: Ensure tripHistory and tripLogs are populated for active trip
